alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Fajardo; Luquillo; Rio Grande (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 02 at 9:24PM ADT until July 02 at 11:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Ceiba Municipality in Puerto Rico... Fajardo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Luquillo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Rio Grande Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 1045 PM AST. * At 824 PM AST, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Rio Fajardo is out of its banks and has flooded PR-194. Between 2 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
